```{r setup}
library(haufenR)
```

```{r example-data}
set.seed(123)
X <- rbind(matrix(rnorm(50*2, mean = 0), ncol = 2),
           matrix(rnorm(50*2, mean = 3), ncol = 2),
           matrix(rnorm(50*2, mean = 6), ncol = 2))
head(X)

res <- k_means(X, K = 3)
res$centers
table(res$clusters)

plot(X, col = res$clusters, pch = 19, main = "k-means Cluster")
points(res$centers, col = 1:3, pch = 8, cex = 2)
```
